title: Homework 3
Homework 3
Homework 3
text:
Task 2: Function Writing
The function below takes in a list identical in structure to bp_list and an R function specified by the user, with mean being the default. The same can be done using different summary statistics.

summ_function<-function(x, stat='mean'){
      my_func<-get(stat)
      a<-my_func(bp_list$treatment$pre_bp)
      b<-my_func(bp_list$treatment$post_bp)
      c<-my_func(bp_list$treatment$diff_bp)
      d<-my_func(bp_list$placebo$pre_bp)
      e<-my_func(bp_list$placebo$post_bp)
      f<-my_func(bp_list$placebo$diff_bp)
      values<-c(a,b,c,d,e,f)
      names(values)<-c(paste("treatment_pre_bp",stat,sep='_'),
                       paste("treatment_post_bp",stat,sep='_'),
                       paste("treatment_diff_bp",stat,sep='_'),
                       paste("placebo_pre_bp",stat,sep='_'),
                       paste("placebo_post_bp",stat,sep='_'),
                       paste("placebo_diff_bp",stat,sep='_'))
      return(values)
    }
    summ_function(bp_list)

 treatment_pre_bp_mean treatment_post_bp_mean treatment_diff_bp_mean 
                131.60                 125.95                   5.65 
   placebo_pre_bp_mean   placebo_post_bp_mean   placebo_diff_bp_mean 
                131.90                 128.90                   3.00 

    summ_function(bp_list,'var')

 treatment_pre_bp_var treatment_post_bp_var treatment_diff_bp_var 
             75.72632              78.99737             117.81842 
   placebo_pre_bp_var   placebo_post_bp_var   placebo_diff_bp_var 
            149.87778             124.98889             341.33333 

    summ_function(bp_list,'sd')

 treatment_pre_bp_sd treatment_post_bp_sd treatment_diff_bp_sd 
            8.702087             8.888046            10.854419 
   placebo_pre_bp_sd   placebo_post_bp_sd   placebo_diff_bp_sd 
           12.242458            11.179843            18.475209 

    summ_function(bp_list,'min')

 treatment_pre_bp_min treatment_post_bp_min treatment_diff_bp_min 
                  115                   114                   -24 
   placebo_pre_bp_min   placebo_post_bp_min   placebo_diff_bp_min 
                  114                   105                   -21 

    summ_function(bp_list,'max')

 treatment_pre_bp_max treatment_post_bp_max treatment_diff_bp_max 
                  151                   146                    21 
   placebo_pre_bp_max   placebo_post_bp_max   placebo_diff_bp_max 
                  152                   143                    33
